'''Recruitment Notice''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Leroy: Dying Flash}}.

==Text==
Mr. Benoit Leroy intends to hire one hourly caretaker. Wanted: Someone good at housekeeping, cooking, and at caring for elderly folks. Mr. Leroy is willing to provide food and board, along with suitable remuneration. Interested parties may contact him directly.<br>[[File:Item Recruitment Notice Image.png|300px]]
